definition: canon/law/standard work of scholarship/literary quotation or allusion/ceremony/to be in charge of/to mortgage or pawn

sentences.english: Poetry prophecy is an exotic flower in remote mountains which is in full bloom in our Chinese classics hundred-flower garden.
sentences.chinese: 诗谶是盛开在中国古典文学百花园里的一株深山奇葩。

sentences.english: It is really a nonclassical communication system.
sentences.chinese: 该系统为一非古典通信系统。

sentences.english: With special renovation, Beijing will again take on the scene it once had, complete with its historical rivers and classical gardens.
sentences.chinese: 通过专项整治，再现京城水系和古典园林的历史风貌。

sentences.english: I also love classical literature, and Cao Xueqin is one of my favorite authors.
sentences.chinese: 我还喜欢古典文学，曹雪芹是我最喜欢的作家之一。

sentences.english: Low wall or story above the cornice of a classical fa?ade.
sentences.chinese: 古典建筑中正面飞檐上的矮墙或矮楼。

sentences.english: Shu Bote living in classicism and romanticism of the transition period.
sentences.chinese: 舒柏特生活在古典主义和浪漫主义的交接时期。

sentences.english: This may seem like a classic Japanese-style pub.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个古典的日式餐厅。

sentences.english: He can run off many classics from memory.
sentences.chinese: 他能把许多古典作品倒背如流。

sentences.english: A selection of long- sleeved casual shirts featuring contemporary and classic styles.
sentences.chinese: 精选的长袖休闲衬衫采用现代和古典风格。

sentences.english: The history enter in 18 centuries next leaf, the classical music parties of Vienna bear.
sentences.chinese: 历史进入18世纪中下叶，维也纳古典乐派诞生。
古典音乐的听众年纪可能大一些。

sentences.english: Stylization is a common feature of classical oriental opera.
sentences.chinese: 程式化是东方古典戏剧的共同特征。

sentences.english: There's still some classic Chinese old world charm here.
sentences.chinese: 还是留有中国的古典美。

sentences.english: Millions of people every year view classic works of art in museums all over the world.
sentences.chinese: 每年，全世界数百万人在博物馆观赏古典艺术作品。

sentences.english: The upper section of a classical building, resting on the columns and constituting the architrave, frieze, and cornice.
sentences.chinese: 柱顶盘，上横梁一座古典的建筑的上部，置于。

sentences.english: A - Hi, I heard you are a talented Classical musician.
sentences.chinese: 嗨，我听说你是天才的古典音乐家。

definition: to return to old ways (a Confucian aspiration)/to turn back the clock/neoclassical school during Tang and Song associated with classical writing 古文/retro (fashion style based on nostalgia, esp. for 1960s)
implicit charm in rhyme or sound/hinted appeal/interest
to pass an exam (or the imperial exam)/to qualify
style (of art or literature)/form/one's work style/moral character
